{
  "structured": {

        "year": 2025
      },
      {
        "degree": "Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.), Communications and Information Engineering",
        "institution": "University of Science and Technology at Zewail City",
        "year": 2025
      },
      {

        "institution": "The Red Sea STEM School, Hurghada",
        "year": 2020
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "Information Technology Administrator",
        "company": "Raya Electric for Manufacturing",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": 2025,
        "highlights": [
          "Provide technical support and manage systems remotely using SCCM, MDT, and WDS.",
          "Update software with Kaspersky and WSUS, handle help desk operations, and implement Active Directory policies.",
          "Ensure compliance with ISMS and ISO standards."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Software Engineer",
        "company": "OBM Education Company",
        "start_year": 2019,
        "end_year": 2022,
        "highlights": [
          "Began career at OBM Education from high school and officially joined as a part-time technical developer from August 2020 to December 2022.",
          "Worked extensively on digital transformation projects, focusing on the website and application development."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Junior Teaching Assistant",
        "company": "Zewail City of Science and Technology",
        "start_year": 2022,
        "end_year": 2023,
        "highlights": [
          "Assisted in teaching and mentoring students in C++ programming, data structures, and SQL database concepts.",
          "Conducted lab sessions, graded assignments, and provided technical guidance on course projects.",
          "Supported students in debugging code and optimizing database queries to enhance their problem-solving skills."
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Python",
      "C",
      "C++",
      "TypeScript",
      "JavaScript",
      "HTML",
      "CSS",
      "ReactJS",
      "Next.js",

    ],
    "certifications": [],
    "languages": [],
    "projects": [
      {
        "name": "Design and Development of a UAV for Fire Detection and Suppression",
        "description": "Developing an autonomous VTOL UAV for fire detection and suppression, integrating computer vision and flight control; configuring PX4 (Pixhawk) and implementing MAVLink interface with Raspberry Pi; using MAVROS for autonomous navigation and suppression missions; incorporating thermal imaging and obstacle avoidance.",
        "tech": [
          "PX4 (Pixhawk)",
          "MAVLink",
          "Raspberry Pi",
          "MAVROS",
          "Computer Vision"
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Research on IoT and Wireless Communication Protocols",
        "description": "Study on IoT communication techniques (LoRa and NB-IoT) and evaluation of T-MAC protocol and IEEE 802.15.4 for low-power wireless sensor networks.",
        "tech": [
          "LoRa",
          "NB-IoT",
          "IEEE 802.15.4",
          "T-MAC"
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Wireless Sensor Network Simulation and Lifetime Optimization",
        "description": "Designed and simulated a WSN model in MATLAB to optimize network lifetime; implemented direct and dual-hop transmission; developed clustering algorithms achieving a 20% increase in network lifetime.",
        "tech": [
          "MATLAB"
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "AI-Powered Safety Monitoring System for Jotun Egypt",
        "description": "Developed a real-time safety-violation detection system using YOLO; built a Next.js dashboard integrated with Pocketbase for tracking violations, live streaming, analytics, and real-time notifications.",
        "tech": [
          "YOLO Object Detection",
          "Next.js",
          "Pocketbase"
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Electric Vehicle Rally (EVER V)",
        "description": "Led embedded systems team; developed real-time communication between vehicle sensors and strategy dashboard; designed data acquisition system; developed interactive GUI for driver with vehicle status and energy metrics.",
        "tech": []
      },
      {
        "name": "Minesweeper Robot",
        "description": "Developed robot localization and minefield mapping; implemented image processing using OpenCV on Raspberry Pi; integrated sensor data for real-time autonomous navigation.",
        "tech": [
          "OpenCV",
          "Raspberry Pi"
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 45,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 22,
      "experience_impact": 7,
      "performance_productivity": 5,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 2,
      "leadership_collaboration": 3,
      "education_certifications": 4,
      "projects_initiative": 2
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "junior",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Has the must-have skill TypeScript and modern web stack exposure (ReactJS/Next.js/Node.js).",
        "Demonstrated project delivery in a production-like context (AI dashboard with Next.js and Pocketbase).",
        "Some leadership experience stated (Head of Embedded Systems Team) and teaching/mentoring exposure as a teaching assistant.",
        "Exposure to AWS and IT infrastructure practices (SCCM/WSUS/Active Directory) which can be relevant to operations-aware engineering."
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "Does not show extensive senior fullstack experience delivering production-grade web applications; experience appears part-time and mixed with IT administration/academic roles.",
        "Backend depth expected for the role is not evidenced (API design REST/GraphQL, service integration, microservices/event-driven architecture not explicitly stated).",
        "Database breadth expected (relational + NoSQL with schema design/query optimization) is not clearly demonstrated; only Microsoft SQL Server/SQL concepts are mentioned.",
        "Cloud/containerization/CI-CD requirements are not evidenced (Docker and CI/CD pipelines not listed).",
        "Testing discipline (unit/integration/e2e, quality gates) is not explicitly described.",
        "English language requirement is not explicitly stated in the resume.",
        "Location preference England/Europe: current phone is Italian (+39) and Bologna university is listed, but no explicit location/country is stated."
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [
      "Fullstack Developer (Junior)",
      "Frontend Developer (React/Next.js)",
      "Software Engineer"
    ],
    "ai_thought": "Candidate matches the TypeScript requirement and shows relevant Next.js/React/Node exposure through projects, but the resume does not evidence the seniority level and core backend/system-design/cloud/CI-CD/testing expectations for a Senior Fullstack role. Better aligned to junior-to-mid fullstack/frontend roles or product-oriented web engineering roles with mentorship.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "Fullstack Developer (Junior/Mid)",
      "Frontend Engineer (React/Next.js)",
      "Node.js Developer (Junior/Mid)",
      "Software Engineer"
    ]
  }
}
